FallenCore is a 2D platformer about Ardi the repair android, who   
arrived on a huge space station to fix the malfunctioned central   
core of the ship. After the breakdown, many on-board mechanisms    
became dangerous and can easily kill the character, as well as     
the robots "went crazy" and arranged a hunt for Ardi not to let    
it get...                                                          

For more info go to: http://store.steampowered.com/app/670090/
